ygData.subject: searching for old erudian, elder elvish, elder Teir'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a wiazard on the E ci server, who is Searching for someone who is fluent or at least better than average in any or all of those three languages.  I will
ygData.messageBody:
I am a wiazard on the E'ci server, who is Searching for someone who is fluent
or at least better than average in any or all of those three languages. I
will trade whatever knowledge i have (fluent in 10 tongues, know at least
basics of 18 total) and might even be able to scrounge up some money. Also
looking to know if anyone has seen someone speaking dragon, or the combine
tongue! I don't even know if they exist.
Thanks,
Zaeq, of E'ci
